item.title: How do i make ::item for admins+?
item.dc:creator: @teh_one teh one
item.description:
@teh_one wrote:

Well it should do, Hybrid PvP V3 is more or less PI. fine try using something like:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerRights == 2) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Item ID does not exist!”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::item ID AMOUNT”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
			}[/code]

the “==” means only people with that rights can use it, the >1 means people over rights=1 can use the command. The >1 should work, but try that one anyway.

You might have to re-code your command.java, it’s what i had to do.

Read full topic
